name: Tastiest chocolate
description:
Made by 1e0 and cocosar07 for the LÖVE Jam 2021

Story at you own interpretation!

Thanks to Zekiel for the beta test.

Controls
  • Move with arrow keys / ZQSD / WASD
  • Aim with mouse
  • Shoot with left click
Libraries
  • https://github.com/a327ex/STALKER-X
  • https://github.com/bjornbytes/cargo
  • https://github.com/vrld/hump
Sound effects
  • sfxr.me
